name: Backrooms: Perpetual
description:
The backrooms is an almost infinite non-linear space, which means that our Universe's physics and time do not apply to this Universe.

I have taken this idea of the backrooms and made it into reality.

A phycological horror where your goal is to find an exit to the backrooms while being chased by an entity. Single player or multiplayer. Procedurally generated canon and non canon levels from the backrooms lore. With the idea to make a full fledged story mode alongside the regular mode.

List of content to expect:

- Multiplayer
- Many Levels of the backrooms lore
- Many creatures/entities of the backrooms lore and even my own ideas
- Procedurally Generated Maps
- Regular updates (Going for major updates weekly)
- Immersive high quality graphics and materials
- First Person POV
- Mouse and keyboard controls

List of future content ideas:

- Story Mode
- Coop Story Mode
- Multiple Endings for story mode
- Third Person POV ??
- Controller Inputs ??


If you have any questions, or even content ideas you would like to see in the game, please send me an email: mattsapbusiness@gmail.com
